title.rendered: Summer School on Approximation Algorithms 2025 at CSA IISc Bangalore [May 21-25]: Apply by March 25

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Summer School on Approximation Algorithms 2025 at IISc Bangalore. The application deadline is March 25, 2025!

About CSA IISc Bangalore

The Department of Computer Science and Automation (CSA) at the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) originated from the School of Automation, established in 1969. Initially focused on automatic control, it expanded in the 1980s to include computation and communication, shaping its current identity.

CSA conducts cutting-edge research in three core areas:

  • Theoretical Computer Science – covering algorithms, cryptography, graph theory, coding theory, and complexity theory.
  • Computer Systems and Software – including computer architecture, operating systems, programming languages, databases, and distributed computing.
  • Intelligent Systems – focusing on AI, machine learning, data mining, optimisation, and information retrieval.

The department actively contributes to premier research publications, develops open-source software, and engages in scientific initiatives, including industry collaborations, government programs, and international conferences.

Workshop Details

The Summer School on Theoretical Computer Science offers a valuable learning opportunity for senior undergraduate and graduate students looking to enhance their knowledge in the field. This year’s program features a series of in-depth lectures on advanced topics in approximation algorithms, complemented by a diverse selection of talks covering emerging trends and foundational concepts in theoretical computer science. Designed to provide an immersive educational experience, the program fosters intellectual growth, encourages knowledge exchange, and connects participants with leading experts and like-minded peers.

Applications Updates

  • Applications Open – CSA IISc Bangalore is accepting applications until March 25th at 11:59 PM.
  • Reference Letter Requirement – Applicants must provide a reference letter from a faculty member. A submission link for the faculty member will be provided at the end of the application form.

How to Apply?

Interested applicants must complete the application form before the deadline.

Workshop Duration

May 21-25, 2025

Deadline

The application deadline is March 25, 2025!

Venue

  • The workshop will be held at the Indian Institute of Science (IISC), Bangalore.
  • Address: IISC Campus, CV Raman Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560012, India.

Contact Details

For more information, contact at algorithms.iisc@gmail.com.
